title: Leviathan.007
author: Leviathan.007
content: Description:The following website is offering hype investment plans from 20 percent daily to 40 percent weekly to the victims to attract their attention. Also, they give a 5 percent referral commission to the users who invite other people into this project.Reference Link:Code:real-miners.netWhoIs info:https://whois.domaintools.com/real-miners.netCreated on 2022-10-30Expires on 2023-10-30Updated on 0001-01-01Payment Method:Bitcoin, Litecoin, Ethereum, etc...Archive:https://archive.vn/ygNvIAdditional Notes:In order to take down this project please report the website to their registrar (In this case NameCheap). Here is a little guide about how to report the scammers to their registrar: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5281378

comments.author: albon
comments.created_time: December 22, 2022, 02:37:18 PMLast edit: December 22, 2022, 03:15:12 PM by albon
comments.body: This HYIP site is undoubtedly 100% a scam, also they put a fake certificate for their company as a registered company and they edited the certificate with photoshop because the original registered company with number 08053966 is CREEK INVESTMENTS LTD, they put this certificate to deceive investors as a registered company with an official headquarters, most of the HYIPs sites that offer investment plans and huge investment returns like this is undoubtedly a scam, so I advise everyone who sees such sites to stay away from them or to review all their details before depositing even a single dollar with them.[ 1 ] https://find-and-update.company-information.service.gov.uk/company/08053966

comments.author: ScamViruS
comments.body: Quote from: Leviathan.007 on December 22, 2022, 08:24:59 AMDescription:The following website is offering hype investment plans from 20 percent daily to 40 percent weekly to the victims to attract their attention. Also, they give a 5 percent referral commission to the users who invite other people into this project.Their referral commission is a main way to get more crypto users. Because a lot of people will help promote this website because of the greed of commission. These Hyip websites are an old scamming technique, but scammers keep up with the trend and present the old technique to crypto users in a new way. When the bear market starts. Then such Hyip websites appear. New crypto users should think that there is no real way to make such huge profits quickly.

comments.author: Getmon
comments.body: Quote from: ScamViruS on December 22, 2022, 02:42:26 PMQuote from: Leviathan.007 on December 22, 2022, 08:24:59 AMDescription:The following website is offering hype investment plans from 20 percent daily to 40 percent weekly to the victims to attract their attention. Also, they give a 5 percent referral commission to the users who invite other people into this project.Their referral commission is a main way to get more crypto users. Because a lot of people will help promote this website because of the greed of commission. These Hyip websites are an old scamming technique, but scammers keep up with the trend and present the old technique to crypto users in a new way. When the bear market starts. Then such Hyip websites appear. New crypto users should think that there is no real way to make such huge profits quickly.I cannot believe that real Facebook accounts are also using referral links to promote these scam investments. Even when I approached them, they maintained their defense of these con websites. They no longer care about honor in order to make money.     There will be no more poor people in the world if these HYIP offerings are true. However, like all HYIP offerings, it is only a fantasy. Because there is no real way to make a lot of money quickly. Bravo for exposing these fraudulent websites. Let us report them all.

comments.author: ScamViruS
comments.body: Quote from: Getmon on December 23, 2022, 01:46:50 PMQuote from: ScamViruS on December 22, 2022, 02:42:26 PMQuote from: Leviathan.007 on December 22, 2022, 08:24:59 AMDescription:The following website is offering hype investment plans from 20 percent daily to 40 percent weekly to the victims to attract their attention. Also, they give a 5 percent referral commission to the users who invite other people into this project.Their referral commission is a main way to get more crypto users. Because a lot of people will help promote this website because of the greed of commission. These Hyip websites are an old scamming technique, but scammers keep up with the trend and present the old technique to crypto users in a new way. When the bear market starts. Then such Hyip websites appear. New crypto users should think that there is no real way to make such huge profits quickly.I cannot believe that real Facebook accounts are also using referral links to promote these scam investments. Even when I approached them, they maintained their defense of these con websites. They no longer care about honor in order to make money.     There will be no more poor people in the world if these HYIP offerings are true. However, like all HYIP offerings, it is only a fantasy. Because there is no real way to make a lot of money quickly. Bravo for exposing these fraudulent websites. Let us report them all.  You will continue to receive offers from such Hyip websites through various Telegram DMs, if you are active in any large group on Telegram. Because they use all mediums including telegram. I get most of these investment program offers on Telegram. It is not that they promote these websites for the only sake of commission, many times the owners of the websites promote all this scam hyip and if they can convince you to invest once, they will run away with your money. So it's all a scam game
